short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A chrome extension that use ai to fill form

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
AI Form Filler & Cover Letter Generator

This Chrome extension is designed to streamline your job application process by leveraging the power of AI. It offers two main functionalities:

1. Form Filling Automation:

The extension can automatically fill out web forms using data you provide. It intelligently selects input values, checkbox states, and dropdown options based on the context of the form and your sample data. This is achieved through seamless integration with OpenAI's GPT models, ensuring that the most relevant information is used for each form field.

The extension dynamically identifies form elements such as text inputs, checkboxes, radio buttons, and select drop downs. It uses AI to determine the most appropriate values for these elements, ensuring accuracy and relevance.

It provides a user-friendly interface to manage form data and initiate the form-filling process with a single click.

Cover Letter Generation:

With just a few clicks, generate a personalized cover letter tailored to a specific job description. By analyzing the job details and your provided data, the extension crafts a professional cover letter, saving you time and effort in your job search.

Key Features:

Data Persistence: Save your form data locally, so you don't have to re-enter information every time you use the extension.

Intelligent Input Selection: Uses AI to determine the most appropriate values for form fields, ensuring accuracy and relevance.

Dynamic Form Interaction: Automatically detects and interacts with various form elements, including text inputs, checkboxes, radio buttons, and select drop downs.

User-Friendly Interface: Easily switch between tabs to manage form data and generate cover letters.

Secure and Private: Your data is stored locally and only used for the purpose of form filling and cover letter generation.(but it does use OpenAI api to generate confirm content).

This extension is perfect for job seekers looking to enhance their application process with the help of AI, making it faster and more efficient.
